mapper.select: SELECT * FROM students_courses WHERE student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM course_application_status WHERE student_course_id = #{studentCourseId} ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (name, kana_name, nick_name, email, area, age, sex, remark, isDeleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses (student_id, course_name, course_start_at, course_end_at) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartAt}, #{courseEndAt})

INSERT INTO course_application_status ( student_course_id, application_status, created_at, last_updated_at, last_updated_by, notes, isDeleted) VALUES (#{studentCourseId}, #{applicationStatus}, #{createdAt}, #{lastUpdatedAt}, #{lastUpdatedBy}, #{notes}, #{isDeleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE students_courses SET course_name = #{courseName} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE course_application_status SET application_status = #{courseApplicationStatus.applicationStatus}, last_updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, last_updated_by = #{courseApplicationStatus.lastUpdatedBy}, notes = #{courseApplicationStatus.notes} WHERE student_course_id = #{studentCourseId} AND isDeleted = false
